title: Buddy In The Sky
extended_details: We want to create an IOT connected drone to act as a personal companion. We want the companion to be able to perform simple tasks like identify objects, retrieve objects from waypoints, and follow its owner.

parts_and_costs.part: Raspberry Pi Camera Board v2 - 8 Megapixels
Adafruit DC & Stepper Motor HAT for Raspberry Pi - Mini Kit
DC Motor in Micro Servo Body
Hobbypower DIY S500 Quadcopter with APM2.8 Flight Controller 7M GPS an
